actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to terminate the insurance of any bank which fails to pay a certain rate of interest on all tax and loan accounts.
short_title: Tax and Loan Account Interest Act

summary.text: Tax and Loan Account Interest Act - Terminates, under the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, the insurance of any bank which fails to pay Federal funds rate of interest on all tax and loan accounts.

titles.title: Tax and Loan Account Interest Act
A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to terminate the insurance of any bank which fails to pay a certain rate of interest on all tax and loan accounts.
